revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=PK5001A |fcc_date=05/05/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=LNQPK5001A |us_id=LNQDL02BPK5001A |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50810;XWAY ARX168 (PSB 50810 EL); |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81A-25T |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=W13S5121632A-5T |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8221;XWAY WAVE300 (PSB 8221EL V1.1); |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8304;XWAY WAVE300 (PSB 8304 V1.1); |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Lantiq |sw_model=PSB 6970;XWAY TANTOS (PSB 6970 HL V1.3); |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=U-Boot;2010.06;Lantiq;v-2.2.6-aei-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.42;OpenWrt Backfire; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CenturyLinkXXXX, |default_ssid_regex=^CenturyLink[0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=A0:A3:E2 |oui_eth=A0:A3:E2 }} :{{TagLine|Wireless N ADSL2 Modem/Router}} ''Wireless 11n ADSL2+ Modem Gateway'' :[http://www.actiontec.com/products/product.php?pid=295 Product page]
"Actiontec" and "06703B." is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
RAM specs are per the FCC photos.. but the FCC photos also show :the device with a 128MB '''Hynix''' H27U1G8F2BTR-BC Flash. ''[[Actiontec]]'''s page for the PK5001A states uses 64MB Flash.
*CPU: Lantiq PSB 50810 - XWAY ARX168 (PSB 50810 EL) The wireless chipset is [[Lantiq]] [[Lantiq#WAVE300|WAVE300]] based. *Lantiq PSB 8221 - XWAY WAVE300 (PSB 8221EL V1.1) *Lantiq PSB 8304 - XWAY WAVE300 (PSB 8304 V1.1)
The FE Switch appears to be a ''TANTOS''. *Lantiq PSB 6970 - XWAY TANTOS (PSB 6970 HL V1.3)
Possible 40:8B:07 OUI (on a label including the device MAC :affixed to the board in the FCC internal photos)...
